Cry the Darkness: One Woman's Triumph over the Tragedy of Incest bụ akụkọ ndụ onwe onye nke Donna L
Friess dere nke na-akọwapụta mmetọ mmekọahụ nna ya na nwa nwanne ya nwaanyị, na otu Friessa si emeso ya
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na N’afo Puku nari itolu na iri itolu na ato (1993) site n'aka mgbasa Ozo ahuike.
